description: Finally I´m back at the office. It was terrible just lying around at home knowing I was missing so many cute boys. This Slovakian fitness enthusiast made me forget about it completely. The boy was the first applicant that day. And what an applicant he was! He used to be a footballer but some time ago he chose fitness to be his main interest. And it certainly paid well. When he took his T-shirt off, I could feel my cock getting harder. At first I thought he was definitely straight because he claimed to have a girlfriend, and his cock was extremely unresponsive to my touch. But when I offered him 10 000 for anal, his answer totally surprised me. He refused to let me in his ass, instead, he offered to fuck me!
title: Dirty Scout 48
